personalInfo.title: Marketing Manager
personalInfo.summary: "Results-driven Marketing Manager with a background in software development, leveraging expertise in React, Python, and leadership to drive business growth and innovation. Proven track record of delivering high-impact projects, including a 10-20% website speed improvement at Google, where I was recognized as the region's top software developer."

bullets: * Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Computer Science at the University of Technology.
* Expected to complete the degree in February 2026.

workExperience.description: worked and made 120 thousand lines of code and made the website faster by 10-20 percent and won the honor of the best software developer on the region
bullets: Developed and maintained 120,000+ lines of high-quality code to drive software innovation at Google.
Improved website performance by 10-20% through strategic coding and optimization techniques.
Achieved regional recognition as the Best Software Developer, solidifying expertise in software development.

projects.name: Mobile App
projects.description: Made the UI and the frontend and backend made 12+ features made the api faster by 15 percent and published iton app store

projectsPolished.name: Mobile App
projectsPolished.description: Designed and developed a mobile app using React, Node.js, and i18n, resulting in a 15% increase in API speed and 12+ features.
